title: The Things I Never Said
description: Evangeline loves Micah, Micah loves Evangeline, and it seems like a perfect Summer – so why is he acting off? Withdrawn, distant, not talking about whatever it is that’s bothering him. He won’t tell – and she won’t give up, not until she sees him smile again.*Warning: this book contains graphic language, sex, and violence. Mature readers only. Not intended for young readers.* ***To be released in the Red Hot Candy boxset July 28, 2015***
author: Jo Raven
